 043:         :param input_d: Bz * n_e

 045:         :param pulse: The form of the pulse. The sum of this array should be 1. (It's normed.)
 046:         :param factor: The constant factor (Should include dx as well.)
 047:         :param global_start: The cell from which the propagation begins (This cell is also included).
 048:         :param global_end: The cell at which the propagation stops (This cell is not included).
 049:         :param pulse_step: For now it should stay 1.
 050:         :param interpolation: Turns of and off the linear interpolation of the radial data.
 051:         :param inc_sym: For the static case. If set to True, the output is multiplied by two,
 052:          so that one can integrate only over the first half of the path. The distribution is symmetric
 053:           in the static case.
 054:         :param add: If True, the summed effect is added to the output, if False it overwrites the data there.
 055:         """

  __PYX_XDEC_MEMVIEW(&__pyx_v_self->input_d, 0);
  __PYX_INC_MEMVIEW(&__pyx_v_input_d, 0);
